about.me: Hardworking, dedicated, stake pool operator with an I.T. and filmmaking background. Focussed on maintaining a great stake pool, while also contributing to the Cardano community by making informative and inspirational videos about our favourite blockchain. Link to our best video: http://youtu.be/hmlGaFjlgKE
about.server: 1 block producer (the main node) + multiple relays distributed around the world for maximum coverage.
